### hasTiedDef() {#a52a80d854cd5cff3ba2b98e4323eb125}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool hasTiedDef (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &#42; MRI, unsigned reg)</>}

<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// don&#39;t fit should be spilled (or split) ASAP so they don&#39;t create</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interference.  Mark a bit to prioritize global above local ranges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">      Prio = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      GlobalBit = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Priority bit layout:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 31 RS&#95;Assign priority</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 30 Preference priority</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if (RegClassPriorityTrumpsGlobalness)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   29-25 AllocPriority</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   24 GlobalBit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   29 Global bit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   28-24 AllocPriority</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 0-23 Size/Instr distance</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clamp the size to fit with the priority masking scheme</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    Prio = std::min(Prio, (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80bd4ec8a9b2f8e7d9d75ab708a55c2">maxUIntN</a>(24));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a87e65296f2a6d9570117a852af342764">isUInt&lt;5&gt;</a>(RC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#ad33e9f6afa3710617ba9cc7396209f4b">AllocationPriority</a>) &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;allocation priority overflow&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RegClassPriorityTrumpsGlobalness)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">      Prio |= RC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#ad33e9f6afa3710617ba9cc7396209f4b">AllocationPriority</a> &lt;&lt; 25 | GlobalBit &lt;&lt; 24;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">      Prio |= GlobalBit &lt;&lt; 29 | RC.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass/#ad33e9f6afa3710617ba9cc7396209f4b">AllocationPriority</a> &lt;&lt; 24;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mark a higher bit to prioritize global and local above RS&#95;Split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    Prio |= (1u &lt;&lt; 31);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Boost ranges that have a physical register hint.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>-&gt;hasKnownPreference(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">      Prio |= (1u &lt;&lt; 30);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Prio;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Prioritize by virtual register number, lowest first.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = LI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><Highlight kind="normal">      SE-&gt;splitRegOutBlock(BI, IntvOut, IntfOut);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle live-through blocks. The relevant live-through blocks are stored in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the ActiveBlocks list with each candidate. We need to filter out</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// duplicates.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><Highlight kind="normal">  BitVector Todo = SA-&gt;getThroughBlocks();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UsedCand : UsedCands) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><Highlight kind="normal">    ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt; Blocks = GlobalCand&#91;UsedCand&#93;.ActiveBlocks;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a> : Blocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Todo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a15d63c566878e964c19139b2c76c0dab">test</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><Highlight kind="normal">      Todo.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector/#a168122d6ac4ed2a8b722e01b592ad289">reset</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IntvIn = 0, IntvOut = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><Highlight kind="normal">      SlotIndex IntfIn, IntfOut;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CandIn = BundleCand&#91;Bundles-&gt;getBundle(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><Highlight kind="normal">        Cand.Intf.moveToBlock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><Highlight kind="normal">        IntfIn = Cand.Intf.first();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CandOut = BundleCand&#91;Bundles-&gt;getBundle(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CandOut != NoCand) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><Highlight kind="normal">        IntvOut = Cand.IntvIdx;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><Highlight kind="normal">        Cand.Intf.moveToBlock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IntvIn &amp;&amp; !IntvOut)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><Highlight kind="normal">      SE-&gt;splitLiveThroughBlock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af83da56920f4f1059b02e07966f9fccfab2ee912b91d69b435159c7c3f6df7f5f">Number</a>, IntvIn, IntfIn, IntvOut, IntfOut);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal">  DebugVars-&gt;splitRegister(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, LREdit.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeedit/#aa2c5b3a9e319c21b55d9de1c3791eea2">regs</a>(), &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a575345318339b28557a6c8ea57708434">LIS</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OrigBlocks = SA-&gt;getNumLiveBlocks();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sort out the new intervals created by splitting. We get four kinds:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Remainder intervals should not be split again.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Candidate intervals can be assigned to Cand.PhysReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Block-local splits are candidates for local splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - DCE leftovers should go back on the queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = LREdit.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeedit/#a2e56ee2f27a7c83b385e3c879fe4ee90">size</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveInterval &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a575345318339b28557a6c8ea57708434">LIS</a>-&gt;getInterval(LREdit.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeedit/#a3456a41d2c4561bb42f944f3d22a9d2b">get</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore old intervals from DCE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtraInfo-&gt;getOrInitStage(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>.reg()) != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4aaf834b42b2a0d02d826326e0f0ec6d17">RS&#95;New</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remainder interval. Don&#39;t try splitting again, spill if it doesn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// allocate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntvMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><Highlight kind="normal">      ExtraInfo-&gt;setStage(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a9cd7330a76c1cb3b85bc898ff6d80fba">RS&#95;Spill</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Global intervals. Allow repeated splitting as long as the number of live</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// blocks is strictly decreasing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IntvMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &lt; NumGlobalIntvs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SA-&gt;countLiveBlocks(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>) &gt;= OrigBlocks) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Main interval covers the same &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; OrigBlocks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">                          &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; blocks as original.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t allow repeated splitting as a safe guard against looping.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal">        ExtraInfo-&gt;setStage(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a19273cebb739bf7e6bf1acc0393c6dad">RS&#95;Split2</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Other intervals are treated as new. This includes local intervals created</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for blocks with multiple uses, and anything created by DCE.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#afbeaddcf447db994c372dfff591105ac">VerifyEnabled</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">    MF-&gt;verify(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;After splitting live range around region&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9a7b5c68c90f85baaedaa854cc5002cc">errs</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">MCRegister RAGreedy::tryRegionSplit(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveInterval &amp;VirtReg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    AllocationOrder &amp;Order,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal">                                    SmallVectorImpl&lt;Register&gt; &amp;NewVRegs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>-&gt;shouldRegionSplitForVirtReg(&#42;MF, VirtReg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#a4aa6aac0f36c1123df3686f7b4150d2c">MCRegister::NoRegister</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumCands = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="normal">  BlockFrequency SpillCost = calcSpillCost();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal">  BlockFrequency BestCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if we can split this live range around a compact region.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasCompact = calcCompactRegion(GlobalCand.front());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HasCompact) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Yes, keep GlobalCand&#91;0&#93; as the compact region candidate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><Highlight kind="normal">    NumCands = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal">    BestCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a5bd2a8de4fde83093df0cc2415db2312">BlockFrequency::max</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No benefit from the compact region, our fallback will be per-block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// splitting. Make sure we find a solution that is cheaper than spilling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><Highlight kind="normal">    BestCost = SpillCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cost of isolating all blocks = &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ada715bce8140114cd2fd2f8ab018f7c3">printBlockFreq</a>(&#42;MBFI, BestCost) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestCand = calculateRegionSplitCost(VirtReg, Order, BestCost,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               NumCands, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;IgnoreCSR&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// No solutions found, fall back to single block splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!HasCompact &amp;&amp; BestCand == NoCand)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#a4aa6aac0f36c1123df3686f7b4150d2c">MCRegister::NoRegister</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> doRegionSplit(VirtReg, BestCand, HasCompact, NewVRegs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip a regmask on the same instruction as the last use. It doesn&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// overlap the live range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a0b73244049319d841fd11a238f35b5d1">SlotIndex::isSameInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;, RMS&#91;RI&#93;) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1 == NumGaps)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39; &#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; RMS&#91;RI&#93; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;:&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><Highlight kind="normal">      RegMaskGaps.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Advance ri to the next gap. A regmask on one of the uses counts in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// both gaps.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RI != RE &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a19695ead28a0fbdcea66c6253aebc44f">SlotIndex::isEarlierInstr</a>(RMS&#91;RI&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1&#93;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><Highlight kind="normal">        ++RI;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1627"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1628"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1629"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1630"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Since we allow local split results to be split again, there is a risk of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1631"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// creating infinite loops. It is tempting to require that the new live</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1632"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ranges have less instructions than the original. That would guarantee</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1633"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// convergence, but it is too strict. A live range with 3 instructions can be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1634"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// split 2+3 (including the COPY), and we want to allow that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1635"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1636"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Instead we use these rules:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1637"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1638"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 1 Allow any split for ranges with getStage() &lt; RS&#95;Split2. (Except for the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1639"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    noop split, of course).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1640"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 2 Require progress be made for ranges with getStage() == RS&#95;Split2. All</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1641"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    the new ranges must have fewer instructions than before the split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1642"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// 3 New ranges with the same number of instructions are marked RS&#95;Split2,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1643"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    smaller ranges are marked RS&#95;New.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1644"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1645"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These rules allow a 3 -&gt; 2+3 split once, which we need. They also prevent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1646"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// excessive splitting and infinite loops.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1647"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1648"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ProgressRequired = ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a19273cebb739bf7e6bf1acc0393c6dad">RS&#95;Split2</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1649"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1650"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Best split candidate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1651"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestBefore = NumGaps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1652"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestAfter = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1653"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestDiff = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1654"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1655"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> blockFreq =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1656"><Highlight kind="normal">      SpillPlacer-&gt;getBlockFrequency(BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a6d25ab70a5fda1310dad85ddb8ecaa22">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3aa22d521bd6a7e6b9f35545dc7b0f1e">getNumber</a>()).getFrequency() &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1657"><Highlight kind="normal">      (1.0f / MBFI-&gt;getEntryFreq().getFrequency());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1658"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;float, 8&gt;</a> GapWeight;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1659"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1660"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> PhysReg : Order) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1661"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PhysReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1662"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Keep track of the largest spill weight that would need to be evicted in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1663"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order to make use of PhysReg between UseSlots&#91;I&#93; and UseSlots&#91;I + 1&#93;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1664"><Highlight kind="normal">    calcGapWeights(PhysReg, GapWeight);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1665"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1666"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remove any gaps with regmask clobbers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1667"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;checkRegMaskInterference(VirtReg, PhysReg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1668"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Gap : RegMaskGaps)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1669"><Highlight kind="normal">        GapWeight&#91;Gap&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa3bc1efc2622aa9bf1e0d05b3d9600de">huge&#95;valf</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1670"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1671"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to find the best sequence of gaps to close.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1672"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The new spill weight must be larger than any gap interference.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1673"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1674"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We will split before Uses&#91;SplitBefore&#93; and after Uses&#91;SplitAfter&#93;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1675"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SplitBefore = 0, SplitAfter = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1676"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1677"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaxGap should always be max(GapWeight&#91;SplitBefore..SplitAfter-1&#93;).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1678"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It is the spill weight that needs to be evicted.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1679"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxGap = GapWeight&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1680"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1681"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1682"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Live before/after split?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1683"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveBefore = SplitBefore != 0 || BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a4c7b9375634dd9b55f130ae4c428475c">LiveIn</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1684"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveAfter = SplitAfter != NumGaps || BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a42e9b38c4f9bc0c0aca6f0c8c5cd1f80">LiveOut</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1685"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1686"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af085ea923a328b9fa6a1975f1a4ff987">printReg</a>(PhysReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39; &#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitBefore&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1687"><Highlight kind="normal">                        &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitAfter&#93; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; I=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; MaxGap);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1688"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1689"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop before the interval gets so big we wouldn&#39;t be making progress.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1690"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LiveBefore &amp;&amp; !LiveAfter) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1691"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; all\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1692"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1693"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1694"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Should the interval be extended or shrunk?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1695"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Shrink = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1696"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1697"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// How many gaps would the new range have?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1698"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewGaps = LiveBefore + SplitAfter - SplitBefore + LiveAfter;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1699"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1700"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Legally, without causing looping?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1701"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsimilarity/#af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bda8f7357506e00d8cd0694f948f909865d">Legal</a> = !ProgressRequired || NewGaps &lt; NumGaps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1702"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1703"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/irsimilarity/#af46430106334db52bfa7a4107e53a0bda8f7357506e00d8cd0694f948f909865d">Legal</a> &amp;&amp; MaxGap &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa3bc1efc2622aa9bf1e0d05b3d9600de">huge&#95;valf</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1704"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Estimate the new spill weight. Each instruction reads or writes the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1705"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register. Conservatively assume there are no read-modify-write</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to guess the size of the new interval.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EstWeight = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aea0a52847ac687ee3f8d144b248ebae0">normalizeSpillWeight</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><Highlight kind="normal">            blockFreq &#42; (NewGaps + 1),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitBefore&#93;.distance(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;SplitAfter&#93;) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><Highlight kind="normal">                (LiveBefore + LiveAfter) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex/#a5b8b6416308ea52c3b8712b32764c9fea0d0c291488b64cffb191fda8a4e90ef0">SlotIndex::InstrDist</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><Highlight kind="normal">            1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Would this split be possible to allocate?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Never allocate all gaps, we wouldn&#39;t be making progress.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; w=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; EstWeight);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EstWeight &#42; <a href="#a121070ba7388da52c72cbb1929ebd594">Hysteresis</a> &gt;= MaxGap) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><Highlight kind="normal">          Shrink = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">float</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Diff = EstWeight - MaxGap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Diff &gt; BestDiff) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; (best)&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><Highlight kind="normal">            BestDiff = <a href="#a121070ba7388da52c72cbb1929ebd594">Hysteresis</a> &#42; Diff;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><Highlight kind="normal">            BestBefore = SplitBefore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><Highlight kind="normal">            BestAfter = SplitAfter;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to shrink.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Shrink) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (++SplitBefore &lt; SplitAfter) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; shrink\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recompute the max when necessary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GapWeight&#91;SplitBefore - 1&#93; &gt;= MaxGap) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><Highlight kind="normal">            MaxGap = GapWeight&#91;SplitBefore&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = SplitBefore + 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != SplitAfter; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><Highlight kind="normal">              MaxGap = std::max(MaxGap, GapWeight&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1738"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1739"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1740"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1741"><Highlight kind="normal">        MaxGap = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1742"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1743"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1744"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to extend the interval.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1745"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SplitAfter &gt;= NumGaps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1746"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; end\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1747"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1748"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1749"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1750"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; extend\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1751"><Highlight kind="normal">      MaxGap = std::max(MaxGap, GapWeight&#91;SplitAfter++&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1752"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1753"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Didn&#39;t find any candidates?</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BestBefore == NumGaps)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1758"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1759"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Best local split range: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;BestBefore&#93; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;-&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1760"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>&#91;BestAfter&#93; &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; BestDiff &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;, &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1761"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; (BestAfter - BestBefore + 1) &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; instrs\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1773"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the new range has the same number of instructions as before, mark it as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// RS&#95;Split2 so the next split will be forced to make progress. Otherwise,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// leave the new intervals as RS&#95;New so they can compete.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveBefore = BestBefore != 0 || BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a4c7b9375634dd9b55f130ae4c428475c">LiveIn</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveAfter = BestAfter != NumGaps || BI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/splitanalysis/blockinfo/#a42e9b38c4f9bc0c0aca6f0c8c5cd1f80">LiveOut</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewGaps = LiveBefore + BestAfter - BestBefore + LiveAfter;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1823"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1824"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First try to split around a region spanning multiple blocks. RS&#95;Split2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1825"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ranges already made dubious progress with region splitting, so they go</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1826"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// straight to single block splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1827"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a19273cebb739bf7e6bf1acc0393c6dad">RS&#95;Split2</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1828"><Highlight kind="normal">    MCRegister PhysReg = tryRegionSplit(VirtReg, Order, NewVRegs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1829"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PhysReg || !NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1830"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhysReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1831"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Then isolate blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tryBlockSplit(VirtReg, Order, NewVRegs);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><Highlight kind="normal">        !<a href="#a0f14d670a4b600adab212ed51ad70059">ExhaustiveSearch</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Early abort: too many interferences.\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><Highlight kind="normal">      CutOffInfo |= CO&#95;Interf;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveInterval &#42;Intf : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(Q.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveintervalunion/query/#a6d5858ffe61498c3109205046a16a98b">interferingVRegs</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If Intf is done and sits on the same register class as VirtReg, it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// would not be recolorable as it is in the same state as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VirtReg. However there are at least two exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If VirtReg has tied defs and Intf doesn&#39;t, then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is still a point in examining if it can be recolorable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Additionally, if the register class has overlapping tuple members, it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// may still be recolorable using a different tuple. This is more likely</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if the existing assignment aliases with the candidate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (((ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(&#42;Intf) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4ab3dc0864c572a7f8895334b0f8d235d4">RS&#95;Done</a> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#aba058f684e1b6704e5b4a09f889ec18c">MRI</a>-&gt;getRegClass(Intf-&gt;reg()) == CurRC &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><Highlight kind="normal">            !<a href="#a6e87024d7fe817808e0288f6b213d40c">assignedRegPartiallyOverlaps</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a523cbc58f79fe5e9e95dc87f9cee8a36">TRI</a>, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a96bb57a8041a40ded1ba0ef3b411a615">VRM</a>, PhysReg, &#42;Intf)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
