<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><Highlight kind="comment">/// tryLastChanceRecoloring - Try to assign a color to \\p VirtReg by recoloring</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><Highlight kind="comment">/// its interferences.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Last chance recoloring chooses a color for \\p VirtReg and recolors every</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><Highlight kind="comment">/// virtual register that was using it. The recoloring process may recursively</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"><Highlight kind="comment">/// use the last chance recoloring. Therefore, when a virtual register has been</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><Highlight kind="comment">/// assigned a color by this mechanism, it is marked as Fixed, i.e., it cannot</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be last-chance-recolored again during this recoloring &quot;session&quot;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><Highlight kind="comment">/// E.g.,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Let</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vA can use &#123;R1, R2    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vB can use &#123;    R2, R3&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vC can use &#123;R1        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Where vA, vB, and vC cannot be split anymore (they are reloads for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instance) and they all interfere.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vA is assigned R1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vB is assigned R2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vC tries to evict vA but vA is already done.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Regular register allocation fails.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Last chance recoloring kicks in:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vC does as if vA was evicted =&gt; vC uses R1.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vC is marked as fixed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vA needs to find a color.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><Highlight kind="comment">/// None are available.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vA cannot evict vC: vC is a fixed virtual register now.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vA does as if vB was evicted =&gt; vA uses R2.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><Highlight kind="comment">/// vB needs to find a color.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><Highlight kind="comment">/// R3 is available.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Recoloring =&gt; vC = R1, vA = R2, vB = R3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p Order defines the preferred allocation order for \\p VirtReg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p NewRegs will contain any new virtual register that have been created</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (split, spill) during the process and that must be assigned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p FixedRegisters contains all the virtual registers that cannot be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><Highlight kind="comment">/// recolored.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p RecolorStack tracks the original assignments of successfully recolored</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><Highlight kind="comment">/// registers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p Depth gives the current depth of the last chance recoloring.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2067"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The recoloring attempt failed, undo the changes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2068"><Highlight kind="normal">    FixedRegisters = SaveFixedRegisters;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2069"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a865e0247c5f922b8afaaaec481e4939c">Matrix</a>-&gt;unassign(VirtReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2072"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// don&#39;t add it to NewVRegs because its physical register will be restored</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2073"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// below. Other vregs in CurrentNewVRegs are created by calling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2074"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// selectOrSplit and should be added into NewVRegs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2075"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> R : CurrentNewVRegs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2076"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RecoloringCandidates.count(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regallocbase/#a575345318339b28557a6c8ea57708434">LIS</a>-&gt;getInterval(R)))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2078"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewVRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(R);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2079"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2080"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2081"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Roll back our unsuccessful recoloring. Also roll back any successful</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2082"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// recolorings in any recursive recoloring attempts, since it&#39;s possible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2083"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// they would have introduced conflicts with assignments we will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2084"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// restoring further up the stack. Perform all unassignments prior to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2085"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reassigning, since sub-recolorings may have conflicted with the registers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2086"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we are going to restore to their original assignments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2087"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ssize&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = RecolorStack.size() - 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &gt;= EntryStackSize; --<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><Highlight kind="comment">/// tryRecoloringCandidates - Try to assign a new color to every register</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2138"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange/#a66ff664a97cd3c30de7e873335a0c075">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Only empty live-range do not require a register&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ragreedy/#a61a893421c22ef66b14401945560e4af"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ragreedy/#a61a893421c22ef66b14401945560e4af">RAGreedy::selectOrSplit</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;VirtReg,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2158"><Highlight kind="normal">  CutOffInfo = CO&#95;None;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2159"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = MF-&gt;getFunction().getContext();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2160"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1d6cfdcc234093f39fb0719ddb649500">SmallVirtRegSet</a> FixedRegisters;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2161"><Highlight kind="normal">  RecoloringStack RecolorStack;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2162"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2163"><Highlight kind="normal">      selectOrSplitImpl(VirtReg, NewVRegs, FixedRegisters, RecolorStack);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> == ~0U &amp;&amp; (CutOffInfo != CO&#95;None)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2165"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint8&#95;t CutOffEncountered = CutOffInfo &amp; (CO&#95;Depth | CO&#95;Interf);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2166"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CutOffEncountered == CO&#95;Depth)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2167"><Highlight kind="normal">      Ctx.emitError(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;register allocation failed: maximum depth for recoloring &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CutOffEncountered == CO&#95;Interf)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2171"><Highlight kind="normal">      Ctx.emitError(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;register allocation failed: maximum interference for &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2172"><Highlight kind="normal">                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;recoloring reached. Use -fexhaustive-register-search &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2173"><Highlight kind="normal">                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;to skip cutoffs&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2174"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CutOffEncountered == (CO&#95;Depth | CO&#95;Interf))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2175"><Highlight kind="normal">      Ctx.emitError(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;register allocation failed: maximum interference and &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2178"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2179"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2180"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2181"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2182"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Using a CSR for the first time has a cost because it causes push|pop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2183"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to be added to prologue|epilogue. Splitting a cold section of the live</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2184"><Highlight kind="comment">/// range can have lower cost than using the CSR for the first time;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2185"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Spilling a live range in the cold path can have lower cost than using</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2186"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the CSR for the first time. Returns the physical register if we decide</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2187"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to use the CSR; otherwise return 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2188"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> RAGreedy::tryAssignCSRFirstTime(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocationorder">AllocationOrder</a> &amp;Order, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2190"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint8&#95;t &amp;CostPerUseLimit, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Register&gt;</a> &amp;NewVRegs) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4a9cd7330a76c1cb3b85bc898ff6d80fba">RS&#95;Spill</a> &amp;&amp; VirtReg.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a1a07a284547e2997c90a6a1be428cd47">isSpillable</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We choose spill over using the CSR for the first time if the spill cost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2193"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is lower than CSRCost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2194"><Highlight kind="normal">    SA-&gt;analyze(&amp;VirtReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (calcSpillCost() &gt;= CSRCost)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2196"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhysReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2198"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We are going to spill, set CostPerUseLimit to 1 to make sure that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we will not use a callee-saved register in tryEvict.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2200"><Highlight kind="normal">    CostPerUseLimit = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExtraInfo-&gt;getStage(VirtReg) &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a81973eb0c2304a2d8a2f44d7d3da8fa4aa1960643af2f8c3fe5c97a4cda996619">RS&#95;Split</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We choose pre-splitting over using the CSR for the first time if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the cost of splitting is lower than CSRCost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><Highlight kind="normal">    SA-&gt;analyze(&amp;VirtReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumCands = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a> BestCost = CSRCost; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t modify CSRCost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestCand = calculateRegionSplitCost(VirtReg, Order, BestCost,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                 NumCands, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;IgnoreCSR&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BestCand == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06af9883480b45663348fb5529c563fd6f2">NoCand</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the CSR if we can&#39;t find a region split below CSRCost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PhysReg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Perform the actual pre-splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><Highlight kind="normal">    doRegionSplit(VirtReg, BestCand, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42;HasCompact&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, NewVRegs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RAGreedy::initializeCSRCost() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We use the larger one out of the command-line option and the value report</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by TRI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><Highlight kind="normal">  CSRCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Raw cost is relative to Entry == 2^14; scale it appropriately.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ActualEntry = MBFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineblockfrequencyinfo/#aa9c041cb61532576659d652739439acc">getEntryFreq</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a8e9ed6b20c2503f66f1fd0725297aedc">getFrequency</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ActualEntry) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><Highlight kind="normal">    CSRCost = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t FixedEntry = 1 &lt;&lt; 14;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ActualEntry &lt; FixedEntry)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2243"><Highlight kind="normal">    CSRCost &#42;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(ActualEntry, FixedEntry);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2244"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ActualEntry &lt;= UINT32&#95;MAX)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2245"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invert the fraction and divide.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2246"><Highlight kind="normal">    CSRCost /= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a>(FixedEntry, ActualEntry);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2247"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2248"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Can&#39;t use BranchProbability in general, since it takes 32-bit numbers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2249"><Highlight kind="normal">    CSRCost =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2250"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency">BlockFrequency</a>(CSRCost.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockfrequency/#a8e9ed6b20c2503f66f1fd0725297aedc">getFrequency</a>() &#42; (ActualEntry / FixedEntry));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2251"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2272"><Highlight kind="normal">                           OtherPhysReg));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2276"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Using the given \\p List, compute the cost of the broken hints if</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2288"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2289"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Using the register assigned to \\p VirtReg, try to recolor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2290"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all the live ranges that are copy-related with \\p VirtReg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2291"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The recoloring is then propagated to all the live-ranges that have</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2292"><Highlight kind="comment">/// been recolored and so on, until no more copies can be coalesced or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2293"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it is not profitable.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2294"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For a given live range, profitability is determined by the sum of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2295"><Highlight kind="comment">/// frequencies of the non-identity copies it would introduce with the old</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2296"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and new register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2297"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RAGreedy::tryHintRecoloring(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveInterval &amp;VirtReg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2298"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have a broken hint, check if it is possible to fix it by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2299"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reusing PhysReg for the copy-related live-ranges. Indeed, we evicted</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2300"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// some register and PhysReg may be available for the other live-ranges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2301"><Highlight kind="normal">  SmallSet&lt;Register, 4&gt; Visited;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2302"><Highlight kind="normal">  SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 2&gt; RecoloringCandidates;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2303"><Highlight kind="normal">  HintsInfo <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Try to recolor broken hints.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Broken hints may be repaired by recoloring when an evicted variable</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><Highlight kind="comment">/// freed up a register for a larger live-range.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Consider the following example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2378"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BB1:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2379"><Highlight kind="comment">///   a =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2380"><Highlight kind="comment">///   b =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2381"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BB2:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"><Highlight kind="comment">///   = b</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><Highlight kind="comment">///   = a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2385"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Let us assume b gets split:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2386"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BB1:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2387"><Highlight kind="comment">///   a =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"><Highlight kind="comment">///   b =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BB2:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"><Highlight kind="comment">///   c = b</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><Highlight kind="comment">///   d = c</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"><Highlight kind="comment">///   = d</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"><Highlight kind="comment">///   = a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2395"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Because of how the allocation work, b, c, and d may be assigned different</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2396"><Highlight kind="comment">/// colors. Now, if a gets evicted later:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2397"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BB1:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2398"><Highlight kind="comment">///   a =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2399"><Highlight kind="comment">///   st a, SpillSlot</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2400"><Highlight kind="comment">///   b =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2401"><Highlight kind="comment">/// BB2:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2402"><Highlight kind="comment">///   c = b</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2404"><Highlight kind="comment">///   d = c</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><Highlight kind="comment">///   = d</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><Highlight kind="comment">///   e = ld SpillSlot</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><Highlight kind="comment">///   = e</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This is likely that we can assign the same register for b, c, and d,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2409"><Highlight kind="comment">/// getting rid of 2 copies.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2410"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RAGreedy::tryHintsRecoloring() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LiveInterval &#42;LI : SetOfBrokenHints) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2412"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval/#a14d46e70db7e417c8ed5bc66fb295185">reg</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Recoloring is possible only for virtual registers&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2435"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
